Metadata.title: Logeshwaran N :: Software Engineer
Metadata.description: I'm Logeshwaran N, software engineer based in Bangalore, India. Passionate about problem-solving and product engineering, I help companies with big data, web development, and data scraping.

Index.subtitle: Results-driven engineer who thrives on tackling complex technical challenges and transforming business requirements into scalable, user-focused solutions.
Index.details: My technical expertise spans backend development with Go and Python, API design across REST, gRPC, GraphQL, and WebSockets, plus database management with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis. I leverage modern DevOps practices including Docker/Kubernetes containerization, CI/CD pipelines, cloud platforms (AWS/GCP), and comprehensive monitoring solutions to build and maintain scalable, production-ready systems.

data.title: Software Development
data.content: As a Software Engineer, I build scalable backend systems using Go and microservices architecture, with expertise in PostgreSQL database design and optimization. I specialize in container orchestration and deployment automation using Kubernetes for enterprise-scale applications.

web.title: Cloud
web.content: As a Cloud Architect specializing in AWS, I design and implement scalable cloud infrastructure using services like EC2, EKS, RDS, and Lambda for enterprise applications. I architect resilient, cost-optimized solutions leveraging AWS best practices for security, monitoring, and automated deployment pipelines.

scraping.title: Gen AI
scraping.content: As a Generative AI Enthusiast, I develop and deploy LLM-powered applications using AWS Bedrock, implementing RAG architectures and MCP protocols for intelligent document processing and conversational AI systems. I specialize in fine-tuning large language models and building scalable AI infrastructure that integrates seamlessly with enterprise workflows.

meta.title: Blog
meta.description: Logeshwaran N: Stay up to date with my latest articles on Cloud & Software engineering!
